name: Pop the Ice
summary:
"Pop The Ice" is a truly fun and exciting ice cube popping game. The goal of this game is to hit the table hard and pop the ice cube up to the top.

You need to use different glasses to catch the ice cube on different floors; these tricky glasses might slide, vanish or explode anytime. Whenever you beat the bosses and reach the top floor, you'll receive new cocktails as gifts! Be careful, if you drop the ice cube, you fail the mission!
